question: List as many European influenza vaccines as possible.
ideal_answer: Three split-virion vaccines (Vaxigrip, Begrivac, and Influsplit/Fluarix) and three subunit vaccines containing only viral surface glycoproteins (Influvac, Agrippal, and Fluvirin).

snippets.text: Three split-virion vaccines (Vaxigrip, Begrivac, and Influsplit/Fluarix) and three subunit vaccines containing only viral surface glycoproteins (Influvac, Agrippal, and Fluvirin) available for the 1994-95 season were analysed by biological, molecular, and biochemical methods.

exact_answer: Vaxigrip, Begrivac, Influsplit, Fluarix, Influvac, Agrippal, Fluvirin
